name: Fog in the Forest
promptSnippet: Inspired by fog in the forest, mysterious but calm atmosphere. Colours of dark trunks, buish fog, dark branches. Wall in white.

description.en: Medium dark grey chevron vinyl flooring with irregular tone, wood-effect finish. Soft matte finish, subtle grain, gentle variation in tone.
Dark grey marble with dramatic, busy pattern: mixed charcoal, grey, and subtle warm inclusions, irregular mineral texture
Garrison gray colour with blue undertone.
Matte dark brown cabinet fronts with fine horizontal wood grain texture
